about_the_game:
A haematology patient is struggling with life in hospital. Their health is suffering and they feel scared and alone. Suddenly they develop a new purpose when they uncover a conspiracy: the hospital is being run by cultists and their monster army. Our protagonist must join forces with other patients, uncover the secrets of the hospital, and fight through hordes of monsters to save the world!



  • Explore the Hospital and all its intricate mysteries...
  • Interact with a varied cast of Characters in the hospital, and if you play your cards right, you can recruit them to your cause!
  • Assemble your team to go on expeditions to the depths..
  • Fight & Navigate your way through the many labyrinthian floors of the depths
  • Defeat the Monster Bosses that stand in your way
  • Unlock new areas above and below


  • British Voice Acting
  • A primarily Grime-genred OST
  • More than 15 characters to recruit
  • 7 unique boss fights
  • 5 hospital wards to explore
  • 1 secret mini-game
  • 50+ weapon variations to try out
  • More funky fresh disabilites than you can shake a stick at
